                                           ArrayAdapter<E,A> getter,
                                           int minEntries)
        Split a page
        Parameters:
        entries - Entries to split
        getter - Adapter for the entries array
        minEntries - Minimum number of entries in each part
        Returns:
        BitSet containing the assignment.
